title: zulu55
author: zulu55
content: VIRTUALSIM.NETSMS verification serviceGeneral informationPersonal dedicated anonymous phone numbers of Ukraine (+380), Russia (+7), Kazakhstan (+7 7), UK (+44) and Cambodia (+855) to register and keep any web service with SMS verification. Anonymous - no personal data, encrypted chat available on demand(OTR Jabber), cryptocurrencies payment option.Personally yours - we do not re-sell and re-use numbers even if you ordered one-time activation.Working since autumn of 2014; solid customers base.All numbers are real sim cards.Simple and fast - orders are available through our site. Support is online if there is any specific request or lack of information.Accessible every day from 11am till 7pm (11:00-19:00) GMT (except Saturday, it's always a vacant day).Every registration is exclusive - number will not be reused for web-services you have already registered.After creating account on our site (login and password only required) you get web panel for numbers query.Leasing of numbers can be extended (except Onetime plan).Our FAQ: https://virtualsim.net/faq.phpPlease read carefully before proceeding with orders.We can also process incoming voice verification - ask for details when you make an order.PLANSDedicated number - $20/year.All the number belongs exclusively to you. You can register any amount of services and receive verification codes regularly during 1 year.Special conditions:There is a restriction on receiving SMS from electronic payment systems with this particular pricing plan.EXTENDED- $15/month.15h/day (07-22 GMT)Dedicated number available for use in our extended working hours.Manual SMS reception with Virtualsim operator via Control Panel.EXTENDED24- $20/month.24 hours a day serviceDedicated number available for use 24/7 via automatic requests through Control Panel.Register any amount of services and receive verification codes during 1 month.AUTOMATIC- $30/month.Always turned onDedicated number ALWAYS ONLINE for 24/7. Just view incoming SMS through Control Panel as they come. Register any amount of services and receive any amount of verification codes during 1 month.Combo - $50/year11-19 GMT (Sat:15-19)Dedicated number, allowed to use financial or any other services.Manual SMS reception with Virtualsim operator via Control Panel.Year Personal - starting from $6/year for one web-service.11-19 GMT (Sat:15-19)One year leasing of phone number for registration and getting SMS from single web site.Pricing plan doesn't suit for electronic payment systems (see Business pricing plan).One-time - from $2 per one web service11-19 GMT (Sat:15-19)One-time number usage for registering and SMS verify from single web serviceSpecial conditions:Pricing plan doesn't suit for electronic payment systems (see Business pricing plan)Pricing plan doesn't allow to use number to receive codes again from the same service!Business - from $3/month11-19 GMT (Sat:15-19)Leasing numbers for registrations and SMS reception with electronic payment systems web services.Bulk orders are discussed on individual basis.Supported payment methods:BTC, LTC, ETH, XMR, USDT TRX, TRX, ZEC, DOGE, DSHPerfectmoneyQiwiAll orders are processed through our site, messengers are only for support and consulting.Our site: VIRTUALSIM.NETOur contacts are:You can use our integrated chat or tickets on our website (registration required)Messenger contacts are available on the bottom of the main page of the site

comments.author: zulu55
comments.body: This is an updated thread from https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5342616.0We now have a major automation update and 24/7 sales for monthly dedicated numbers!

comments.author: zulu55
comments.body: We have new numbers of Netherlands, Latvia and Lithuania. Grab them while you can!
